abstract: Buffalo Bills agree in principle to sign guard Richie Incognito.
lead_paragraph: Buffalo agreed in principle to sign Incognito, an offensive guard who has been out of football since emerging as a central figure in a Miami Dolphins bullying scandal in 2013.

headline.main: After Year Away, Richie Incognito Reaches Deal With the Bills
headline.print_headline: After Year Away, Incognito Reaches Deal With the Bills

snippet: Buffalo agreed in principle to sign Incognito, an offensive guard who has been out of football since emerging as a central figure in a Miami Dolphins bullying scandal in 2013.
